fw.name: NewTopologicalObjects
fw.footer: Copyright © 1999-2011, Dassault Systèmes. All rights reserved.

class.name: CATPositionPtFaceOperator
class.abstract: Class defining the operator that tests the position of a 2D point with respect to a face.

method.name: GetOneResult
method.abstract: Returns the result of the test in case of a point.

method.name: GetResults
method.abstract: Returns the result of the test in case of an array of points.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: SetSurParam
method.abstract: Defines another point to test.

method.name: SetSurParams
method.abstract: Defines another array of points to test.

method.name: SetToleranceOnBoundary
method.abstract: Defines the tolerance for a point to be on the face boundary.

class.name: CATPositionPtVolOperator
class.abstract: Class defining the operator that tests the position of a 3D point with respect to a volume.

method.name: GetLocationResult
method.abstract: Returns the 3D point location.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> operator.

class.name: CATRecomposeShells
class.abstract: Class defining an operator that recomposes a multi-lump body from a list of shells to be removed or a list of shells to be kept.

method.name: GetConflictingShells
method.abstract: When the specification of the shells leads to a matter conflict, no result is generated and GetResult returns a NULL pointer.

method.name: GetResult
method.abstract: Retrieves the resulting body.

method.name: RemoveInternalShells
method.abstract: Removes all the internal shells.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs the operator.

method.name: SetCellsToKeep
method.abstract: Specifies the list of cells to be kept.

method.name: SetCellsToRemove
method.abstract: Specifies the list of cells to be removed.

method.name: SetShellsToKeep
method.abstract: Specifies the list of faces to be kept.

method.name: SetShellsToKeep
method.abstract: Specifies the list of shells to be kept.

method.name: SetShellsToRemove
method.abstract: Specifies the list of faces to be removed.

method.name: SetShellsToRemove
method.abstract: Specifies the list of shells to be removed.

class.name: CATSmartBodyDuplicator
class.abstract: Class defining an operator that duplicates the touched cells (and the cells depending on these touched cells) of a body.

method.name: AddInitialBody
method.abstract: Adds another body to compute the impacts of a touched CATTopology.

method.name: AddLogFilter
method.abstract: dds a new type to be logged inside the journal of <tt>this</tt> duplicator.

method.name: GetDuplicateLyingOn
method.abstract: Returns the lying on link of a duplicated cell.

method.name: GetDuplicatedBody
method.abstract: Returns the pointer to the body inside which the duplicated cells are created.

method.name: GetDuplicatedCell
method.abstract: Returns the mapping between a touched cell and its copy.

method.name: GetDuplicatedDomain
method.abstract: Returns the mapping between a touched domain and its copy.

method.name: GetFullDuplication
method.abstract: Returns a value indicating how the edges and vertices are duplicated by <tt>this</tt>.

method.name: GetInitialBodies
method.abstract: Retrieves the list of the bodies that are taken into account by <tt>this</tt> duplicator.

method.name: GetJournal
method.abstract: Returns the pointer to the journal of <tt>this</tt> iterator.

method.name: ResetLogFilter
method.abstract: Resets the filter on the cells for the journal.

method.name: SetDuplicateLyingOn
method.abstract: Specifies the lying on link of a duplicated cell.

method.name: SetFullDuplication
method.abstract: Specifies how the edges and vertices are to be duplicated by <tt>this</tt>.

class.name: CATTopCAACompliantJournalChecker
class.abstract: Class defining an object that checks a topological journal.

method.name: CAAAddInputBody
method.abstract: Adds an input body to the CATTopCAACompliantJournalChecker object.

method.name: CAACheck
method.abstract: Tests whether the check is valid.

class.name: CATTopEdgePropagation
class.abstract: Class representing the topological operator which performs an edge propagation on a body.

method.name: GetDiagnoses
method.abstract: Gets the propagation diagnoses at each extremity of the output wire.

method.name: SetBoundaryMode
method.abstract: Defines the boundary propagation mode on shell.

method.name: SetContinuityMode
method.abstract: Defines the continuity propagation mode.

method.name: SetReferenceFace
method.abstract: Defines the face to be used as a reference for the orientation of the resulting wire.

method.name: SetTolerance
method.abstract: Defines the tolerance propagation value for a continuity level.

class.name: CATTopMultiResult
class.abstract: Base class for all the operators that output several resulting bodies.

method.name: BeginningResult
method.abstract: Initializes the iterator to the resulting bodies created after a run of <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: GetNumberOfResults
method.abstract: Returns the number of bodies that are created after a run of <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: GetResult
method.abstract: Returns a pointer to the current body.

method.name: NextResult
method.abstract: Skips to the next (and the first in particular) resulting body created after a run of <tt>this</tt> operator.

class.name: CATTopOperator
class.abstract: Abstract class for the topological operators.

method.name: GetFreezeMode
method.abstract: Returns the mode in which the resulting body is created.

method.name: GetInputObjectsForJournal
method.abstract: Returns the input objects used by <tt>this</tt> CATTopOperator to create its journal.

method.name: GetJournal
method.abstract: Returns a pointer to the topological journal associated with <tt>this</tt> CATTopOperator.

method.name: GetResult
method.abstract: Returns a pointer to the resulting body.

method.name: GetResult
method.abstract: Returns the pointer to the resulting body.

method.name: SetFreezeMode
method.abstract: Defines the state of the resulting body.

class.name: CATTopPositionPtFaceOperator
class.abstract: Class defining the operator that tests the position of a 2D point with respect to a face.

method.name: GetOneResult
method.abstract: Returns the result of the test in case of a point.

method.name: GetResults
method.abstract: Returns the result of the test in case of an array of points.

method.name: SetSurParams
method.abstract: Defines another array of points to test.

method.name: SetToleranceOnBoundary
method.abstract: Defines the tolerance for a point to be on the face boundary.

method.name: GetResultListEdges
method.abstract: Returns the list of cells tangent to the initial edges.

class.name: CATTopRelimitByVolume
class.abstract: Operator to trim a shell or a wire by a volume.

method.name: GetResult
method.abstract: Retrieves the trimmed result.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs the operator.

method.name: SetSelectionType
method.abstract: Specifies the portions of the input body to be kept.

class.name: CATTopSewSkin
class.abstract: Interface representing the operator to sew a skin onto a body (solid or skin).

method.name: GetEdgesAndGaps
method.abstract: Retrieves the gaps between the bording edges of the skin to be sewn and the input body.

method.name: GetResult
method.abstract: Returns the body resulting from the sewing operation.

method.name: LogDeletionOnImmersedEdges
method.abstract: To be used only when sewing a skin on a skin.

method.name: ResultIsClosed
method.abstract: Checks whether a sewing operation onto a skin (skin/skin operation) results in a closed skin.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs the operator.

method.name: SetEdgeMapping
method.abstract: To be used to map a free edge of the skin onto a cell of the body (edge or face), to avoid unnecessary calculations.

method.name: SetLiveMode
method.abstract: To be used to specify the operator if it is called in CATIA LiveShape Environment, to deal with the simlpification of LiveGroups.

method.name: SetSelectionSide
method.abstract: To be used to indicate the side where the material is to be added or kept.

method.name: SetSimplificationMode
method.abstract: To be used to specify whether the simplification mode is to be applied.

method.name: SetTolerance
method.abstract: To be used to set a tolerance for the Sewing.

function.name: CATCheckTopology
function.abstract: Performs the topological check of a CGM object.

function.name: CATCreatePositionPtFaceOperator
function.abstract: Creates an operator to test the position of a point with regards to a face.

function.name: CATCreatePositionPtFaceOperator
function.abstract: Creates an operator to test the position of a point with regards to a face.

function.name: CATCreatePositionPtFaceOperator
function.abstract: Creates an operator to test the position of a point with regards to a face.

function.name: CATCreatePositionPtFaceOperator
function.abstract: Creates an operator to test the position of a point with regards to a face.

function.name: CATCreatePositionPtVolOperator
function.abstract: Creates an operator to test the position of a point with regards to a volume.

function.name: CATCreateTopClashOperator
function.abstract: Creates an operator to test the clash of two bodies and generate the intersection between the two bodies.

function.name: CATCreateTopPositionPtFaceOperator
function.abstract: Creates an operator to test the position of a point with regards to a face.

class.name: CATTopClashOperator
class.abstract: Class representing the operator that tests the clash between two bodies, and eventually computes their intersection.

method.name: GetDiagnostic
method.abstract: Returns the clash diagnosis.

method.name: GetResult
method.abstract: Returns the body resulting from the clash operation.

method.name: SetOnlyDiagnosticRequired
method.abstract: Specifies whether only the clash diagnosis is to be issued.

method.name: SetTestVolumeInclusion
method.abstract: For the case where only the diagnostic is required.
